game.name: Beholder
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Use what you uncovered to report anyone capable of plotting against the state. You MUST! But WILL you?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Use what you uncovered to report anyone capable of plotting against the state. You MUST! But WILL you?

reviewHighlights.text: ui 불편함. 초보자 모드에서도 단기간에 돈 나갈 일이 많아 겜이 빡셈. 포인트엔클릭 -> 시야를 넓게 볼수록 클릭이 잘 안되고, 눌렀다가 취소되는 경우가 많음 (시야를 넓게 봐야만 하는 게임인데도) 하다가 짜증나서 더 못하겠음..
